sections.heritageQuote: A legacy of the desert, refined by the art of Grasse.
sections.heritageText: Mesky captures the timeless allure of Mauritania’s golden sands and ancient rituals. By blending rare Saharan ingredients with the exquisite craftsmanship of French perfumery, we create scents that are more than just fragrances—they are journeys of the soul.

footer.subscribeText: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

about.title: Our Essence
about.originText: Mesky was born from the golden dunes of Mauritania, where ancient trade routes meet modern aspirations. We capture the essence of the desert—the warmth of the sun, the mystery of the night, and the timeless rituals of scent.
about.craftText: We source the finest oud, amber, and musk, blending them with rare spices and florals. Our artisans honor traditional techniques while embracing contemporary refinement.
about.promiseText: "To create perfumes that are not just scents, but journeys. Authentic, lasting, and unforgettable."

guide.title: The Art of Scent
guide.discoverSubtitle: Understand the notes that define you and explore our olfactory families.
guide.familiesSubtitle: Explore the four main categories that define modern perfumery.

floral.title: Floral
floral.desc: Romantic, soft, and feminine. The most popular family in perfumery.

woody.title: Woody
woody.desc: Warm, earthy, and dry. Often conveys confidence and mystery.

amber.title: Amber
amber.desc: Sensual, exotic, and rich. Perfect for evening wear and bold statements.

fresh.title: Fresh
fresh.desc: Crisp, clean, and energetic. Like a cool breeze or ocean spray.
